title: Amazing Champ Select Idea
body:
I've been thinking of this for awhile now, why are we not able to organize our champions in the champ select screen? so i decided to make a quick Photoshop of the current champ select, to demonstrate what i think would be a great and handy idea. hopefully this can lead to some great additions to the current champ select

Reddit post: http://redd.it/3ae2b7

replies.body: Lets hope riot see this

This is a really cool idea! it would help so much, think of how many times you have 2 sec to choose a champ because there was a mixup in communication and its only sorted out in the last second and you scramble for the first champ you see that can do that role and usually its the worst possible pick.
also i don't jungle much but i always want to try out trundle but every time i don't get my lane and need to jungle i never remember to pick him. your idea fixes that. 
Also i vote that we remove the instalock button, it has no purpose except to piss off people who actually called the lane, the only thing it does is that if all 10 people click it you can start the game 30 seconds early, tbh if I'm to spend 40+ minutes of my time playing a game, id rather have the 30 sec trying to sort everything out rather than just spend it in a loading screen.

I think the champions' positions' should be overlapping since some (most) champions have more than one role and talso while we're at it the lane should also be sorted in alphabetical order... but i think Riot should see this, it's a great idea. =D
